lead_paragraph: A judge said the government did not show that releasing Mr. Khadr, a former child soldier in Afghanistan, would cause “irreparable harm” to Canada’s international obligations.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Guantánamo Inmate Is Freed on Bail in Canada
headline.main: Omar Khadr, Former Guantánamo Detainee, Is Released on Bail in Canada

snippet: A judge said the government did not show that releasing Mr. Khadr, a former child soldier in Afghanistan, would cause “irreparable harm” to Canada’s international obligations.
abstract: Canadian court frees former Guantanamo Bay prisoner Omar Khadr on bail after 13 years in prison for murder of American soldier Sgt Christopher Speer during battle in Afghanistan.
